title: Ask the Goblin Priestess for Help
tags: ask the goblin priestess for help
content:
Gut at the end of the hall and speak with her and she will ask you to hold out your arm so she can mark your flesh. You will have these dialogue options.

Why should I let you brand me? I assume this mark has a purpose. I'm not letting you burn me for life on a whim. I'm here to spill your guts across the floor.

You find out she carries a parasite as well. Choosing dialogue 1 will show a cutscene of Guts branding you (which Shadowheart will disapprove of) and will give you the following dialogu
